actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To require that impact-resistant eyeglasses be issued under the medical program for members of the uniformed services on active duty

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to insure that impact-resistant eyeglasses be issued under the medical program for members of the uniformed services on active duty. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1074 (a))

titles.title: To require that impact-resistant eyeglasses be issued under the medical program for members of the uniformed services on active duty
